channel.title: Problem
channel.description: [size=14pt]I was just using my server before and it was working perfectly and i had people playing online with me, then my laptop froze and i shut down my computer, turned it back on to find out no one can join my server anymore and i cant join it either!!! somone please help me[/size]

item.title: Problem
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Because… If you… Reboot the uh… Server would be offline…
If it’s online, make sure you’ve port forwarded. Sometimes when a computer restarts it gets a new local/internal IP address. Do Run > Cmd > Ipconfig, make sure the new ‘IPV4 Address’ matches the one you used for port-forwarding, if not, that’s your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem
item.dc:creator: @Broken-Reality Broken-Reality
item.description:
@Broken-Reality wrote:

Tried port forwarding again? :faceplam:

Read full topic
